src:
MU Targetkan Kemenangan Keempat Beruntun di Markas Bournemouth
01 Nov 2019, 17:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah target dicanangkan Daniel James untuk akhir pekan ini. Winger Manchester United itu ingin timnya memetik poin penuh saat berhadapan dengan Bournemouth.
Setan Merah dijadwalkan akan melakoni laga tandang di pekan ke 11 EPL musim ini. Mereka akan mengunjungi Vitality Stadium untuk menantang Bournemouth.
Skuat Setan Merah saat ini tengah berada dalam momentum yang bagus. Mereka sudah memetik tiga kemenangan beruntun paska menumbangkan Chelsea dengan skor 2-1 di tengah pekan nanti.
James menyebut bahwa timnya sudah mempersiapkan diri untuk laga tersebut. "Kami menjalani rotasi pemain, namun semua pemain kami siap bermain di pertandingan itu," beber James kepada situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang winger di bawah ini.
text:
MU Targets Fourth Consecutive Victory at Bournemouth Headquarters
Nov 01 2019, 17:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A target launched by Daniel James for this weekend. The Manchester United winger wants his team to pick full points when dealing with Bournemouth.
The Red Devils are scheduled to play away on Week 11 of the EPL this season. They will visit the Vitality Stadium to challenge Bournemouth.
The Red Devils squad is currently in a good momentum. They have already picked up three consecutive wins after overthrowing Chelsea with a score of 2-1 in the middle of the week.
James said that his team was preparing for the match. "We have a player rotation, but all our players are ready to play in the match," James told the official Manchester United website.

Read the full comment of the winger below.
